resources.string: Simple Night Skincare Routine, Amazing Results!
Recommended Effective Serum for Acne Scars

Acne can make us insecure and difficult to turn off. However, getting rid of acne scars is sometimes more difficult and longer than turning off an active pimple. To speed up the process of fading acne scars, it requires the use of proper and regular skincare. One form of skincare that can help get rid of acne scars is serum. Serums contain active ingredients and vitamins that can help get rid of acne scars. Here are some serums to remove acne scars or so-called acne scars that you can try.
Axis-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum

This serum contains Niacinamide which can reduce dark spots caused by acne and improve uneven skin tone. The plant derived Squalene content in this serum can maintain skin moisture and make skin healthier and glowing. This serum also contains Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Papaya, Propanediol, Erythritol, Butylene, and Glycol ingredients. The content of Niacinamide can also relieve redness and Calendula which is anti-inflammatory. The texture of this serum is light and easy to absorb, leaving the skin feeling moist, smooth, and not sticky.
Avoskin Your Skin Bae Vitamin C 3% + Niacinamide 2% + Mandarin Orange Fruit Extract Serum

The next serum recommendation is from the Avoskin brand. Vitamin C is known to be very effective for brightening the skin and disguising acne scars. In addition to vitamin C, the content of Niacinamide, and Mandarin Orange Extract in this serum can make our skin look brighter optimally. This serum can inhibit the production of melanin in the skin, making it effective for brightening the skin.

For those of you who have acne scars in the form of post-inflammatory pigmentation, you can try this serum. Contains Niacinamide which can strengthen the skin is protective layer by producing Ceramide. Beetroot content can also ward off free radicals, moisturize the skin, fade dark spots, and fight acne.

The next recommended serum to fade dark spots and acne scars is Lacoco Dark Spot Essence. This product contains tranexamic acid which has the maximum ability to fade dark spots as quickly as laser technology. Then, it contains various natural ingredients that are very safe for various types of facial skin. In addition, there are mulberry extracts that function as antioxidants for the skin, licorice extracts that function to fade black spots and acne scars and brighten the face.
Are you having trouble dealing with acne scars? Do not worry, try the serum recommendations for removing acne scars above.
How often should you wash your hair

Hair is a part of the body that needs to be cared for so that it can always be healthy. Shampooing is one of the basic things to take care of your hair by washing your hair using shampoo but washing your hair too often can cause hair damage. Here are some tips to know how often to wash your hair.
Oily hair: It is best to shampoo daily to prevent the build up of oil and dirt.
Dry/damaged hair: Every 5-7 days to stimulate the hairs natural oils.
Fine/thin hair: Shampoo daily to provide sufficient moisture to hair.
Wavy/curly hair: Once every 4-5 days, depending on hair density
Curly hair: Once a week for optimal hair growth.

Body scrubs are a form of exfoliation treatment. This treatment aims to remove dead skin cells from the outside while removing dust and dirt that may be trapped in the pores. skin that is not scrubbed will make the skin dull. Therefore, it is recommended to do body scrubs regularly. There are several benefits of body scrub.
1. Scrub granules can remove dead skin cells.
2. Scrub is claimed to be able to brighten the skin.
3. Relax the body with body scrub granules.
4. Exfoliate with a body scrub to prevent the appearance of acne on the back.
5. Body scrub is useful to overcome cellulite and prevent premature aging.
How to choose a foundation to match your skin tone

One of the must-have makeup products for women is foundation. This makeup product is very useful to make your facial skin look flawless and perfect. By applying foundation, all the flaws that exist on your facial skin such as acne scars and dark spots can be covered. However, don not make the wrong choice of foundation Here are tips for choosing a foundation.

By knowing the basic color of your skin will make the foundation match your skin, choose a foundation color that is almost close to your skin color so that there is no color difference between foundation and severe skin.
2. Choose the type of foundation that suits your skin type.

In addition to adjusting to skin color, you also need to choose a foundation that suits your skin type. For those of you who have oily skin types, you should not choose a foundation that is made from oily as well. But for those of you who have dry skin, you can choose a water-based foundation or one that contains a lot of moisturizers.

After a day of activities, the face that uses foundation will usually turn out to be duller or darker. This is because the foundation undergoes oxidation when exposed to heat, both hot from the sun and heat from body temperature. So, so that the foundation color remains good on the face even though it has been used all day, choose a foundation color that is one level lighter than skin color.
